title: Englewood 2-Bedroom/1Bath for Rent
posting_body: Fantastic home in a great area!
Spacious, updated 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom unit in Englewood, available October 1st, 2022.
Close to everything and one of the best-kept secrets in Englewood!
This downstairs unit has a private entrance and its own separate yard.
It boasts a bright, spacious living area with a stainless-steel fridge, oven, and gas stove.
This unit also includes a washer and dryer and you’ll love the fully remodeled bathroom.
The property is pet-friendly (# and weight restrictions apply) with utilities prorated on a monthly basis.

Walk to Belleview Park, 1 mile to the Englewood Rec Center, Oxford Light Rail Station, minutes away from the Historic Downtown Littleton & 5 minutes to the redeveloped South Broadway Mile, including shops, restaurants & bars.
Applicants are required to complete a rental application and authorize a $45 credit and background check.
